name: Jumping under the Weather
description:
In this game you play as a young traveler who gained the power to control the weather. As he jumps his way through the levels he collects lost clouds to send them back to the sky. His powers help him cross various obstacles.

Controls
Movement - A/D OR ARROW LEFT / ARROW RIGHT
Jump - Space
Change the Weather - TAB

You can change the Weather from five different states which help you with their effects.

SUN
Standard State of the weather. There are no manipulations to the world.

RAIN
Rain drops which spawn water cubes that can be frozen in the SNOW State. Water Cubes are also used to move some platforms in the game.

SNOW
Freezes dropped water cubes and moveable platforms.

STORM (RIGHT)
Blows wind to the right, which automatically moves you and other objects in that direction.

STORM (LEFT)
Same effects as STORM (RIGHT) but in the opposite direction.

This game was made during the Curdle Jam #6. All Assets were made by myself.
Have fun!
